sections.heading: a member.A person becomes a member:(1) As provided in the articles of organization and bylaws;(2) As the result of merger or consolidation under section 21-29,122; or(3) With the consent of all the members
sections.text: SourceLaws 2007, LB368, ยง 30;Laws 2008, LB848, ยง 6.

21-2930.Becoming a member.

A person becomes a member:

(1) As provided in the articles of organization and bylaws;

(2) As the result of merger or consolidation under section 21-29,122; or

(3) With the consent of all the members.

SourceLaws 2007, LB368, ยง 30;Laws 2008, LB848, ยง 6.
